message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really appreciate it. My asking price is $115.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I'm interested in purchasing it but I can only pay up to $100.
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $100 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $110. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to you.
Hi Alice, I understand your position but I still believe $100 is a fair price. I'm willing to go up to $105.
Bob, I understand your budget but $105 just doesn't cover my costs.  How about we split the difference at $107.50?  That's a fair compromise for both of us.
Alice, I appreciate your efforts to meet in the middle. I'm willing to pay $106.
